notes.title: Authors’ contributions
notes.p: YM and XN participated in study design and conception, data acquisition, data analysis, manuscript drafting, and funding acquisition. YS participated in data analysis and manuscript drafting. CY, LS, and ZL participated in data acquisition. XG participated in data analysis. DW participated in discussion and manuscript revision. XY participated in the design and conceptualization of the study, acquisition of data, and data interpretation. LF and YW participated in the design and conceptualization of study, acquisition of data, revising of the manuscript, acquisition of funding, and supervision. All authors were involved in the manuscript’s revision and approved this final version.
